content.question: The figures show four small charged spheres of the same size and electric field vectors at the same distance from each sphere. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitude of the charges <math alttext="Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the spheres?

choices.label: <math alttext="Q sub X is greater than Q sub W, which is greater than Q sub Y, which is greater than Q sub Z " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>W</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="Q sub X is greater than Q sub W, which is greater than, open parenthesis, Q sub Y equals Q sub Z, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>W</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, Q sub W equals Q sub X, close parenthesis, which is greater than, open parenthesis Q sub Y equals Q sub Z, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>W</mtext></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, Q sub W equals Q sub X, close parenthesis, which is greater than Q sub Z, which is greater than Q sub Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>W</mtext></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, Q sub W equals Q sub X, close parenthesis, which is greater than, open parenthesis Q sub Y equals Q sub Z, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>W</mtext></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
